description: Sawara Takenori is the head of L.M.E.`s talent section. Sawara was tormented by http://anidb.net/ch3853 [Kyoko] into getting her into an audition (Kyoko originally auditioned under "Talent" rather than "Acting"). Despite the initial meeting, he is actually very supportive of Kyoko, even through her penchant for tripping her own idol career up.
name: Sawara Takenori
